• {{user.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list', templateUrl: './list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list.component.scss'], providers: [ // { // provide: UserService, // useValue: { // loadUsers: () => { // return of(['HELLO!']); // } // } // } ] }) export class ListComponent { selectedUser: any | null = null; users: any[] = []; constructor(private userService: UserService) { this.userService.loadUsers().subscribe(users => { this.users = users; }); } newUserHandler(name: string) { this.users.push({ name }); } selectUserHandler(user: any): void { if (this.selectedUser?.id === user?.id) { return void (this.selectedUser = null); } this.selectedUser = user; } }
